title: Automation Exercise
summary: This is a full-fledged e-commerce website called AutomationExercise designed for QA engineers of all levels to practice automation and API testing. It provides test cases, API lists, and video tutorials. The site features product categories like WOMEN, MEN, and KIDS, as well as brands like POLO, H&M, and MADAME.

title: Automation Exercise - Dress Products
summary: This webpage displays dress products for women in an online store. It includes categories for women, men, and kids, as well as brands like POLO, H&M, and MADAME. The page lists several dress products with prices and 'Add to cart' buttons, and 'View Product' buttons.

title: Automation Exercise - Product Details
summary: This page displays the details of a product, specifically a 'Long Maxi Tulle Fancy Dress Up Outfits - Pink'. It shows the product's category (Kids > Dress), price (Rs. 1600), availability (In Stock), condition (New), and brand (Biba). Users can add the product to their cart, write a review, and subscribe to receive updates.

title: Automation Exercise - Saree Products
summary: This is a webpage for an online store, specifically featuring saree products within an automation exercise context. The page includes navigation links (Home, Products, Cart, Signup/Login, Test Cases, API Testing, Video Tutorials, Contact us), product categories (Women, Men, Kids), brands, and a listing of saree products with details like price and 'Add to cart' functionality. Some products also have a 'View Product' option.

title: Automation Exercise - Product Details
summary: This page displays the details of a product, a Rose Pink Embroidered Maxi Dress, including its category (Women > Dress), price (Rs. 2300), availability (In Stock), condition (New), and brand (Madame). It also allows users to add the product to their cart, write and submit a review, and subscribe to receive updates.
